thread.title: Federal RICO lawsuit alleges sheriff traded police favors for cash
thread.title_full: Federal RICO lawsuit alleges sheriff traded police favors for cash

author: Roberto Acosta | racosta1@mlive.com
title: Federal RICO lawsuit alleges sheriff traded police favors for cash
text: The lawsuit filed Wednesday, Jan. 25 by attorney Scott Batey alleges Pickell deputized people for $65-$300 a year, which allowed them to act as a deputy and agent for the Genesee County Sheriff's Office and receive court assignments.
